text: "Our Lips Are Sealed" is a 1981 debut single by American new wave The Go-Go's. It is from their debut studio album Beauty and the Beat. It went to number 2 in Australia, number 3 in Canada, number 14 in Sweden, number 20 in the United States, number 23 in New Zealand and number 47 in the United Kingdom. It went on be covered by Fun Boy Three and Hilary Duff. ==References== Category:1981 songs Category:Debut singles Category:Power pop songs Category:The Go-Go's songs Category:Hilary Duff songs
title: Our Lips Are Sealed
